form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Medical Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, NSN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/25/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS MANAGUA. NICARAGUA. FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo., Day, Yr.) SEPT. 30,1991 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at MANAGUA. NICARAGUA NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX (Mo., Day, Yr.) F M I certify that on the above date I examined ALVAREZ Gregoriana 5-14-1914 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON C.026156 NICARAGUAN GOVERNMENT. SEPT. 27,1991 GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Gonorrhea Tuberculosis, Not Active Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma Inguinale Syphilis, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease or Disability: Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Describe findings: Reaction mm Not Done NORMAL CHEST PLATE 33 DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DATE READ ROBERTO CALDERON 9-30-91 SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate treatment under Remarks) Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done SERODIA TEST TYPE: V.D.R.L. TEST TYPE: DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY GUSTAVO HUELVA GUSTAVO HUELVA 9-30-91 9-30-91 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT(S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. 9-30-91 Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE EDMUNDO DELCARMEN Edmando Carmen 9-30-91 NSN 7540-00-139-0058 50157-103 OPTIONAL FORM 157 U.S. Government Printing Office:1989-250-926/00306 REVISED 2-88 DEPT. OF STATE
